Name: Redline
Text: University forces have shown up already?!

Name: Redline
Text: Those cowards, only attacking whenever I'm in a real rush... How typical!

Name: Redline
Text: But wait... My Mecha-Equipment has arrived! Ha ha ha!

Name: Redline
Text: Crushing those Universitians will be a piece of cake!

Name: Redline
Text: Push forward troops! This time, Banktania will be victorious!
